Property Officer - ( Vietnamese National ) PN 11347 – LES 7
Property Officer - ( Vietnamese National ) PN 11347 – LES 7
Level 20 Vincom Center 47 Ly Tu Trong, District 1 Ho Chi Minh City

Monthly salary range: VND 30,302,000 – VND 35,970,000 The Australian Consulate-General in Ho Chi Minh City is seeking a self-motivated and well-organised Vietnamese national qualified candidate for an expected vacancy to fill the position of Property Officer. This position will be offered to the successful candidate on a contractual basis.

Selection for this position will be based on merit and judged against the following specific selection criteria. 1. Relevant educational and/ or work experience in property management in Vietnam, ability to build, develop and maintain effective working relationship with suppliers and contractors to ensure efficient delivery of services to the Consulate; 2. High level interpersonal skills and experience in liaising with landlords and contractors; 3. Demonstrated solid knowledge of office equipment and utilities and strong negotiation skills; 4. Proven ability to work as a team member, to organise work, determine priorities, exercise sound judgement and meet deadlines with minimal supervision; 5. Demonstrated excellent command of written and spoken English and high level of competence in using computer programs. To be considered for interview, applicants must address each of these selection criteria individually to a maximum of two pages. Applicants that fail to address the selection criteria and include referees will not be considered. Only electronic applications will be accepted and should be submitted via email (max. 2 MB) following the instruction here: http://www.hcmc.vietnam.embassy.gov.au/hchi/PropertyOfficervacant.html With the subject of: PROPERTY OFFICER POSITION (insert your name here) The email cover letter to your application must include the following attachments: 1. Written statement addressing each point of the selection criteria 2. Resume (with referees including email and telephone contacts) 3. Supporting documents, evidence of resume claims Duty Statement is available from the Consulate web address: http://www.hcmc.vietnam.embassy.gov.au/hchi/home.html Closing date for applications is 07 August 2014. Applicants will be shortlisted and undergo English-language testing prior to an interview with the selection panel. Only electronic applications IN ENGLISH will be accepted and should be submitted following the instruction here: http://www.hcmc.vietnam.embassy.gov.au/hchi/PropertyOfficervacant.html

DIV.H3: Australian Consulate - General Level 20 Vincom Center 47 Ly Tu Trong, District 1 Ho Chi Minh City

DIV.DIV: Contact person: HR Department Company size: 25-99
